name: Planet Defender Ion Cannon (V)
Lore: 'KDY v-150 surface-to-space heavy ion cannon. The most powerful ground-based weapon in the Rebel arsenal. Reserved for strategic installations due to limited supply.',
Text: 'Deploy on an exterior site.  May target a capital starship (except Executor) at related system for free.  Draw two destiny.  If total destiny > defense value, target is power and hyperspeed = 0 (if target forfeited this battle, may place this weapon out of play to steal it into your hand).',
